title: Fifty Shades of Grey : U.S. sales figures in 2012 , by platform
summary: This is a bar chart representing Copy Type in the x axis and Number of copies in millions in the y axis.
The Number of copies in millions is highest at Copy Type Print and lowest at Copy Type Digital.
The highest Copy Type Print has 14.0 more Number of copies in millions than the lowest Copy Type Digital.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of copies in millions for 2 number of Copy Types.
The Number of copies in millions is highest at Copy Type Print and lowest at Copy Type Digital.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Copy Type in the x axis and Number of copies in millions in the y axis.
The Number of copies in millions is highest at Copy Type Print and lowest at Copy Type Digital.
The highest Copy Type Print has 14.0 more Number of copies in millions than the lowest Copy Type Digital.
max_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Copy Type, and Number of copies in millions in each Copy Type on the y axis.
The Number of copies in millions is highest at Copy Type Print and lowest at Copy Type Digital.
The lowest value at Copy Type Digital is 1.93x times less than the highest value at Print.
The Copy Type Print tends to be 1.32 percent higher than average.
The Number of copies in millions is 44.0 if we add up values of all Copy Types.
